completed_features: Initialize the project using Vite with the React template to create the basic application scaffolding and package.json file.
last_commit:
feat: initialize Vite React project with basic scaffolding

Set up project structure with Vite and React template including:
- package.json with all required dependencies (React 18+, Redux Toolkit, React Router, Material-UI, Axios, testing libraries)
- Vite configuration with path aliases
- Basic app structure (main.jsx, App.jsx, router.jsx)
- Redux store with tasks, categories, and UI slices
- Layout components (Header, Sidebar)
- Placeholder pages (Dashboard, TaskManager, Settings)
- Configuration files (.eslintrc, .prettierrc, jest.config)
- Basic styling (index.css, global.css, variables.css)
